title: University-Based Language Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational job-specific knowledge
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented curriculum linking university-based learning programs with institutional in-house training, based on real-world cases experienced by current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will analyze language-related problem situations in workplace settings and derive solutions.
Learners will apply university-based learning theories to practical cases to develop improvement plans.
Learners will share practical experiences and strengthen reflective professional competencies through collaboration with peer practitioners.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
